## RedemptionDetails.actualKUSDAmount property

Amount of KUSD that was actually redeemed by the transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
actualKUSDAmount: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

This can end up being lower than `attemptedKUSDAmount` due to interference from another transaction that modifies the list of Troves.
